entry.tran: 巴西的；巴西人的；巴西文化的
entry.def: Brazilian means belonging or relating to Brazil, or to its people or culture.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Brazil
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Brazil or the people of Brazil
